name: Mini Red Springer Kit
description:
Contrary to certain folklore, springer kits are not hatched from eggs.
Combine 1 Brown and 2 Red Mini Springer Kits with 4 Unidentified Dyes in the Mystic Forge to create a Mini Yellow Springer Kit.
Combine 1 Yellow, 1 Brown, and 1 Red Mini Springer Kit with 4 Unidentified Dyes in the Mystic Forge to create a Mini Green Springer Kit.
